content.prompt: Which of the following is most characteristic of President Eisenhowerâ€™s Cold War strategy?

choices.label: It caused him to restrict covert operations of the Central Intelligence Agency.
It relied on a massive buildup of conventional troops.
It relied on the principle of massive retaliation.
It utilized counterinsurgency tactics to control communist-influenced rebellions in the developing world.
It drastically restricted any further development of the United States nuclear arsenal.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
